title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 October 2015 - XWiki
content:

10:12 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
10:13 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
10:13 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
10:27 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:39 <vmassol> hmmm question for you guys  
10:39 <vmassol> I'm fixing http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12637  
10:40 <vmassol> however I'm wondering if it's ok to overwrite any change that the user would have made to the custom displayer for the timezone property  
10:40 <vmassol> I don't see any alternative ATM but I'm wondering if it's ok  
10:40 <vmassol> any take?  
10:41 <vmassol> I guess ideally we shouldn't have a custom displayer in our code at all  
10:41 <vmassol> (so that users could use the field to override the display)  
10:41 <vmassol> actually I guess we shoudl move this to a vm  
10:41 <vmassol> trying that  
10:43 <vmassol> hmm it's not a new type so the real solution is to add a new tz type  
10:44 <vmassol> (btw this would fix http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8905 too)  
10:52 <vmassol> I don't really have the time for this for now, so I'll just fix this specific issue  
11:01 <vmassol> ok trying to implement a new timezone class… :)  
11:06 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
11:08 <vmassol> ok it was easy to do but now I need to verify how upgrades will work...  
11:32 <vmassol> mflorea: hi, I've just noticed a possible issue with DW  
11:32 <vmassol> I've built xwiki jetty/hsqldb from source on master and then replaced the data/ dir with one from a clean 7.2 instance  
11:32 <vmassol> then when I started the wiki I clicked "Later" on the DW page  
11:33 <vmassol> and i got https://gist.github.com/vmassol/b3c699e14f9574530730 in the console  
11:33 <vmassol> maybe there's something to improve/fix?  
11:38 <mflorea> vmassol, tmortagne knows this part better. Looks like a bug to me.  
11:39 <msmeria> has quit  
11:40 <tmortagne> vmassol: the error you get is weird since the code is Files.move(tempFile.toPath(), file.toPath(), StandardCopyOption.REPLACE\_EXISTING);  
11:40 <tmortagne> it should not complain about already existing file  
11:40 <tmortagne> (this file always exist in next startup anyway)  
11:40 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:40 <mflorea> unless the rights on the existing file don't allow overwrite maybe  
11:40 <tmortagne> maybe  
11:41 <vmassol> $ ls -l data/jobs/status/distribution/status.xml  
11:41 <vmassol> -rw-r--r--  1 vmassol  staff  6148 Oct  5 11:31 data/jobs/status/distribution/status.xml  
11:41 <vmassol> and my instance is started with vmassol  
11:42 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
11:42 <tmortagne> all I can tell you is that this code is executed on each startup with a file already existing so no idea why you get this error  
11:42 <tmortagne> (each startup and at each step)  
11:44 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
11:52 <mflorea> has quit  
11:57 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
12:40 <vmassol> too bad we're not Thursday :)  
12:41 <vmassol> (I'd have had 2 BFD points!)  
12:52 <vmassol> lunch time

13:54 <vmassol> plenty of upgrade issues for 7.2 that we need to fix...

14:00 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: btw if we upgrade from 7.2 to 7.3SNAPSHOT and skip the DW, the Drawer is displayed empty. I don't know if this is something we want to fix or not.

14:41 <vmassol> nope

14:42 <vmassol> thanks for the heads up ClemensR  
14:42 <vmassol> we also need to check if there's anything can do in core to not break extensions (I don't know the issue at hand here)  
14:43 <gdelhumeau> there is test for that normally: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-flamingo/xwiki-platform-flamingo-skin/xwiki-platform-flamingo-skin-resources/src/main/resources/flamingo/drawer.vm#L41-41
